text: Krypto the runt is a nickelodeon show that aired from 1997 to 2002 in the US and the UK and on MTV and g4 it also aired on social media platforms like TikTok, Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram and Reddit. It was also broadcast on twitch and was revealed on Reddit. The show aired several episodes, including wen Krypto was a baby. And it included episodes of the original. Krypto the super dog and also included Minecraft episodes and episodes of adult swim unicorn Warriors and had comparisons between Oswald, the lucky rabbit, and the original Krypto the super dog
title: Krypto the runt
